title: Abramoff Moves to Greenberg Traurig, Partners with Michael Scanlon
summary: Jack Abramoff leaves Preston Gates to join Greenberg Traurig's government relations practice in Washington, D.C. He begins working with Tom DeLay's former communications director Michael Scanlon, who forms Capitol Campaign Strategies. This partnership would defraud tribal clients of over 0 million through their "gimme five" kickback scheme.

sources.title: Jack Abramoff Indian lobbying scandal - Wikipedia
